#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    int arr[1000001];
    int freq[1000001];
    arr[1]=1;freq[1]=1;
    arr[2]=2;freq[2]=3;
    arr[3]=2;freq[3]=5;
    
    int top=3;
    int i=4;
    while(i<1000001){
        for(int j=0;j<arr[top] && i<1000001;j++){
            arr[i]=top;
            i++;
        }
        top++;
    }
    top=3;
    while(top<1000001){
        freq[top]=freq[top-1]+arr[top];
        top++;
    }
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++){
        int n;
        cin >> n;
        int *p=lower_bound(freq,freq+1000001,n);
        cout << p-freq << endl;
    }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
